comment: He is a Grad student and he makes the class very passable. He only has 4 exams, no final, and they are the only things that are graded. Exams are taken online with no lockdown browser, so it makes it convenient to take exams wherever I might be. Presentations are clean and concise and Zach is overall a very good guy to be around. Take this class.

His presentations were so incomprehensible that they made the entire class impossible to follow. It didn't help that there weren't any tutors for Microeconomics that I could ask for help. The stress of being unable to understand the cluttered PowerPoints got so bad that I became physically sick and was forced to withdraw from the class.

He was one of the best professors I have had ever. He was super caring and was not rude AT ALL. The class was fairly easy. This class has 4 exams and no final. The material he taught was on the tests, no surprises when taking them. I would take this professor again if I could! Take this class!

Great professor and very caring. This class is nice because he does not expect a lot from you which has helped make my semester workload so much better and has allowed me to focus on my harder classes. His book is a worthy read too, and is short but also extra credit points. Very great guy and I'm appreciative
